0: The location is in walking distance to Easton shopping and dining
There is plenty to do and plenty places to eat when you stay at this hotel that are within walking distance
They made a great hotel at a great location even better
Being conveniently located to great shopping and entertainment as well as the airport means nothing
We had a large traditional and delicious breakfast in the dining room with fine service
My wife and I have given Hilton at Easton their last chance
The rooms are always clean and you feel at home
The ballroom looked great food was good and servers were great
You can tell the staff cares about their guests
1: we have stayed at this well run hotel on a number of occasions
location everything nearby construction but not big issue
It was sub par especially given the cost

All my friends have enjoyed the yearly weekend at the Hilton To open the holiday season for the past 14 years The staff was excellent as always but the hotel was under remodeling which greatly interfered with our stay no dinning room no fireplaces etc
You can hear EVERYTHING and I mean EVERYTHING your neighbor is doing
They were doing some major renovations but they were super accommodating otherwise
Was the wash cloth and towel we had already used actually clean
Next time will stay at Residence
Had I known I would not have reserved a room at this location
Once checked in and the staff did not informeither
2: Breakfast next morning all the food was cold
Staying on the club level advertised handcrafted Starbucks coffee
Lunch at the hotel was a relaxing retreat from the shopping commotion at Easton Town Centre
The toilet would spit water out from underneath the tank
Used to be wonderful now it is AWFUL
The exec lounge we had access to was not very appealing
He even made sure to have strawberries and champagne sent to our room
The parking garage for the hotel is completely on the far side of the hotel and diagonally at the longest possible walk from where the restaurant and bar are located

The little things in service that would be expected at a good quality hotel were missing lights in our room were not functioning there were many dirty and sticky spots on the walls and ceiling where tape hopefully had been applied and then removed but not cleaned the room was very noisy from hallway traffic etc
Unlike other Hilton chain hotels this one did not even have a free coffee bar
